verses.roman:
"sarva-śakti nāme dilā kariyā vibhāga
āmāra durdaiva,--nāme nāhi anurāga!!"

synonyms: sarva-śakti—all potencies; nāme—in the holy name; dilā—You have bestowed; kariyā vibhāga—making separation; āmāra durdaiva—My misfortune; nāme—for chanting the holy names; nāhi—there is not; anurāga—attachment.
translation: "You have invested Your full potencies in each individual holy name, but I am so unfortunate that I have no attachment for chanting Your holy names."
